snippet: Theatrhythm, a music game based on a Japanese series, is geared to players with a background in Final Fantasy.
abstract: Kotaku.com review of video game Theatrhythm: Final Fantasy, developed by Indies Zero/Square Enix and published by Square Enix.
lead_paragraph: Theatrhythm, a music game based on a Japanese series, is geared to players with a background in Final Fantasy.

headline.seo: Theatrhythm Is a Music Game Based on a Japanese Series
